text:
Talking About Fiance PC, Nick Jonas Says Real Relationship Is All About Being Your Authentic Self
Talking About Fiance PC, Nick Jonas Says Real Relationship Is All About Being Your Authentic Self
The new innings for lovebirds Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas is all set to begin. The couple is taking all necessary steps for their happy married life and that has begun with them obtaining a marriage license in the US.
Agencies
A report in theblast.com claims that the couple, who got engaged in August, visited the Beverly Hills Courthouse last week and filled out the paperwork to obtain the license.
Agencies
That's not all, Nick and PC are not shying away from talking about each other. In a recent interview with the USA today, Nick revealed that Priyanka is the one person in front of whom he can be his real self. He has been quoted as saying,
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Agencies
“You have to be honest with your other half. That’s where the beauty of a real relationship is, being able to be your authentic self. I have that in my life now."
Reports claim that Priyanka and Nick are all set to tie the knot on December 2 in Jodhpur’s Mehrangarh Fort.
title: Talking About Fiance PC, Nick Jonas Says Real Relationship Is All About Being Your Authentic Self
description: The new innings for lovebirds Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas is all set to begin. The couple is taking all necessary steps for their happy married life and that has begun with them obtaining a marriage license in the US. A report in theblast.com claims that the couple, who got engaged in August, visited the Beverly Hills Courthouse last week and filled out the paperwork to obtain the license.
